explains: n. 奥杜邦（美国鸟类学家、画家和博物学家）

sentences.en: More than 6,000 people follow the updates on the Connecticut Audubon Society's blog.
sentences.cn: 已有超过六千人为康涅狄格州奥杜邦协会的网上博客做实时更新。

sentences.en: His work has been featured in National Geographic, Audubon and Time, as well as numerous award-winning books.
sentences.cn: 他的作品曾被刊登在《国家地理》、《奥杜邦》和《时代》杂志上，以及许多获奖的图书上。

sentences.en: Clients include Vanity Fair National Geographic Audubon Smithsonian American Express Dominion and Virginia Tourism.
sentences.cn: 客户包括名利场，国家地理，奥杜邦，美国博物馆，美国运通，美国力登和弗吉尼亚旅游局。
